name: Unbelievable! Ultimate
overview: A U.S. Gold Master Series label compilation of 4 games originally released as individual titles by Ultimate Play The Game. Jet-Pac: a gallery space shooter for up to 2 players by David Rhys Jones, originally released in 1983. Knight Lore: a single player isometric arcade adventure by Paul Proctor, originally released in 1984. Third game in the Sabreman series. Nightshade: a single player isometric arcade adventure by Paul Proctor. originally released in 1985. Sabre Wulf: a single player arcade adventure by Paul Proctor, originally released in 1984. First game in the Sabreman series.
